title: Heist
gamePlayInstructions:
As a thief, steal the valuable items while avoiding guards.
As a guard, stop the thieves from stealing.

Controls

WASD move
Left Mouse shoot / use
B buy
R reload
E pick up
G drop
M change team
ESC / H menu
settings.menudiv:
Welcome to Heist!
Choose your side: thieves or guards.
Coordinate, strategize, and outsmart your opponents to win the game!
